description:
Hamsters are brilliant and they appreciate being well cared for and loved. Take care of your Hamsters by feeding them, changing their outfits and earning new cages for them to live in. Play games with your Hamsters using the AR Card. Your Hamsters will reward you with hours of fun!

Use the AR Card which was packaged with your Nintendo 3DS system.
name: Brilliant Hamsters!
disclaimer: You may need an additional compatible SD card or SDHC card with available space to download this software. Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
